casebody.data:
John M. KILGORE, Appellant,
v.
Denise A. DOUGLAS, as personal representative of the Estate of Dreka Andrews; Bank of New York Mellon, f/k/a Bank of New York, as trustee for the Certificateholders of the CWABS, Inc., Asset-backed Certificates, Series 2006-18; and Rexanne Smith a/k/a Rexanne Smith Williams, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-2164 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed April 20, 2018.

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
